TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SocketPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class SocketPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class SocketPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制在传输地址上建立或接受连接的权利。

span.span: Controls rights to make or accept connections on a transport address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例的 control 权限，以接受连接或启动连接。 instances control permission to accept connections or initiate connections. A权限可以建立为主机名或 IP 地址、 端口号和传输协议。A permission can be established for a host name or IP address, a port number, and a transport protocol. > [!NOTE] > 避免创建套接字权限使用主机名，因为这些名称必须解析为 IP 地址，并且这可能会阻止堆栈。Avoid creating socket permissions using host names, as these names have to be resolved to IP addresses, and this might block the stack. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类来设置、 更改和强制执行各种套接字访问限制。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to set, change, and enforce various socket access restrictions. [!code-cpp[SocketPermissionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SocketPermissionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SocketPermissionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该类允许对 的无限制访问或不允许对 的访问。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that allows unrestricted access to the or disallows access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用创建实例`Unrestricted`值从则实例将传递所有要求。If the instance is created with the `Unrestricted` value from then the instance passes all demands. 任何其他值`state`导致所有请求都失败，除非使用添加的传输地址权限的实例。Any other value for `state` results in a instance that fails all demands unless a transport address permission is added with . ## Examples 下面的示例创建使用枚举值。The following example creates a using a enumerated value. [!code-cpp[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/CPP/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/CS/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/VB/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.vb#1)]

summary.span: 用指定的权限初始化给定传输地址的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the given transport address with the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建控制对指定访问`hostName`和`portNumber`使用指定`transport`。This constructor creates a that controls access to the specified `hostName` and `portNumber` using the specified `transport`. `hostName`可以是 DNS 名称、 IP 地址或指定的 IP 子网，例如 192.168.1.\*。The `hostName` can be a DNS name, an IP address, or a specified IP subnet, such as 192.168.1.\*. `portNumber`可以是定义由传输，任何有效的端口号或。The `portNumber` can be any valid port number defined by the transport, or . ## Examples 下面的示例创建使用枚举值，枚举值、 主机名和端口号。The following example creates a using a enumerated value, a enumerated value, the hostname, and the port number. [!code-cpp[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/CPP/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/CS/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/VB/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.vb#1)]

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前实例求交的 实例。

span.span: The instance to intersect with the current instance.

summary.span: 返回两个 实例的逻辑交集。

span.span: Returns the logical intersection between two instances.

returns.span: 表示两个 实例的交集的 实例。

span.span: The instance that represents the intersection of two instances.

returns.span: 如果该交集为空，则该方法返回 。

span.span: If the intersection is empty, the method returns .

returns.span: 如果 参数为空引用，则该方法返回 。

span.span: If the parameter is a null reference, the method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下两个权限的交集是可帮助保护的资源和操作受这两个权限的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that helps to protect the resources and operations protected by both permissions. 具体而言，它表示的最小权限，这样的任何请求都会通过这两个权限还通过它们的交集。Specifically, it represents the minimum permission such that any demand that passes both permissions also passes their intersection. 此方法将替代和实现是为了支持接口。This method overrides and is implemented to support the interface. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来获取两个逻辑相交实例。The following example uses the method to obtain a logical intersection between two instances. summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果 为 ，而且当前实例没有定义权限，则此方法返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the current instance defines no permissions; otherwise, .

returns.span: 如果 不为 ，而且当前实例定义了 权限的子集，则该方法返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: If is not , this method returns if the current instance defines a subset of permissions; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定一组完全包含在指定权限的操作，当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对 192.168.1.1:80 访问权限的权限是对 192.168.1.1: any 表示访问权限的子集。For example, a permission that represents access to 192.168.1.1:80 is a subset of a permission that represents access to 192.168.1.1:Any. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前的权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法可确定一个是另一个的子集。The following example uses the method to determine if one is the subset of another. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是表示对的访问权限的所有权限当前实例所表示的连接，以及由表示的访问`target`。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all of the access to connections represented by the current instance as well as the access represented by `target`. 将当前实例传递任何要求或`target`传递其联合。Any demand that passes either the current instance or `target` passes their union. 此方法将替代和实现是为了支持接口。This method overrides and is implemented to support the interface. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以返回两个现有的逻辑联合实例。The following example uses the method to return the logical union of two existing instances.
